item.title: Check Yourself, PolitiFact. Here Are The Biggest Lies Of The Year
item.description: There were so many big lies from the left that PolitiFact naturally ignored.

item.title: ‘The American People Didn’t Vote For This’: Conservatives Blast Johnson’s Christmastime Spending Scam
item.description: The last-minute release of the bill and its contents have drawn criticisms from some of conservative politics' biggest voices.

item.title: NYT’s Bret Stephens, Hoping To Stay Relevant, Is Ready To Leave ‘Never Trump.’ It’s Too Late
item.description: The media don't get to bounce back into the conversation and be taken seriously just by suggesting they've learned something meaningful.

item.title: Republicans Won. Mike Johnson Should Start Acting Like It
